column2: "Ah... Sir! It's been a while since we ran into each other."
"Things have been real crazy for us ARKS lately... It's a relief to see you well."
"Sir... I know this is sudden, but... I want to thank you."
"I mean, you single-handedly saved ARKS, right? You deserve recognition."
"That, and... I'm sorry. For not being able to assist you."
"I'm glad that I wasn't guilty of standing in your way, but... I'm still sorry."
"I think you're amazing for not giving up when all of ARKS was your enemy."
"I'm going to train harder so I can fight alongside you! Until then!"
